name: TinyPNG
description: Smart PNG and JPEG compression to reduce file sizes for your images.

name: Photopea
description: A powerful free online image editor supporting PSD, XCF, Sketch, XD and CDR formats.

name: Online-OCR
description: Recognize text from scanned documents (PDF, JPG, BMP, TIFF, GIF) and convert into editable text formats.

name: 123apps Video Cutter
description: A simple online tool for cutting and trimming video files without re-encoding.

name: Grammarly (Free Version)
description: Ensures your writing is easy to read, effective, and mistake-free. The free version covers basic grammar and spelling.
